name: <panic::location::Location<'_> as fmt::Debug>::fmt
src:
fn fmt(&self, f: &mut fmt::Formatter<'_>) -> fmt::Result {
        f.debug_struct("Location")
            .field("file", &self.file())
            .field("line", &self.line)
            .field("column", &self.col)
            .finish()
    }
